Waltham.Seth Davis House:
The Seth Davis House is a historic house located at 32 Eden Avenue in Newton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The 2-1/2 story brick house was built in the 1820s by Seth Davis, a locally prominent teacher and real estate investor, and is one of the finest Greek Revival houses in the city. It is unusual for having brick detailing instead of wood for the cornices.
